trans-unit.source: A standard endpoint that is pre-configured for discovery operations over a UDP multicast binding.
trans-unit.target: En standardslutpunkt som är förkonfigurerad för identifieringsåtgärder över en multicast-UDP bindning.

trans-unit.source: This endpoint inherits from <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint"></xref> and similarly has a fixed contract and supports two WS-Discovery protocol versions.
trans-unit.target: Den här slutpunkten som ärver från <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint"> </xref> på liknande sätt har en fast kontrakt och stöder två versioner av WS-Discovery-protokollet.

trans-unit.source: In addition, it has a fixed UDP binding and a default address as specified in the WS-Discovery specifications (WS-Discovery April 2005 or WS-Discovery V1.1).
trans-unit.target: Dessutom har en fast UDP-bindning och en adress för standard enligt specifikationerna för WS-Discovery (WS-Discovery April 2005 eller WS-Discovery V1.1).

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Skapar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Skapar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"> </xref> klass med det angivna <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Two versions of the WS-Discovery protocol are currently supported: WS-Discovery April 2005 and WS-Discovery V1.1, which correspond to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscoveryApril2005%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscovery11%2A> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Två versioner av WS-Discovery-protokollet stöds för närvarande: WS-Discovery April 2005 och WS-Discovery V1.1 som motsvarar den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscoveryApril2005%2A>och <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscovery11%2A>uppräkningsvärdena.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscovery11%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscoveryApril2005%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref> to use.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"></xref> class with the specified multicast address.
trans-unit.target: Skapar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"> </xref> klass med den angivna multicast-adressen.

trans-unit.source: The multicast address.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"></xref> class with the specified multicast address.
trans-unit.target: Skapar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"> </xref> klass med den angivna multicast-adressen.

trans-unit.source: The multicast address.

Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref> and multicast address.
trans-unit.target: Skapar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"> </xref> klass med det angivna <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"> </xref> och multicast-adress.

trans-unit.source: Two versions of the WS-Discovery protocol are currently supported: WS-Discovery April 2005 and WS-Discovery V1.1, which correspond to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscoveryApril2005%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscovery11%2A> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Två versioner av WS-Discovery-protokollet stöds för närvarande: WS-Discovery April 2005 och WS-Discovery V1.1 som motsvarar den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscoveryApril2005%2A>och <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscovery11%2A>uppräkningsvärdena.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscovery11%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscoveryApril2005%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref> to use.
The multicast address for the UDP discovery endpoint.

Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref> and multicast address.
trans-unit.target: Skapar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"> </xref> klass med det angivna <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"> </xref> och multicast-adress.

trans-unit.source: Two versions of the WS-Discovery protocol are currently supported: WS-Discovery April 2005 and WS-Discovery V1.1, which correspond to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscoveryApril2005%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscovery11%2A> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Två versioner av WS-Discovery-protokollet stöds för närvarande: WS-Discovery April 2005 och WS-Discovery V1.1 som motsvarar den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscoveryApril2005%2A>och <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscovery11%2A>uppräkningsvärdena.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscovery11%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscoveryApril2005%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref> to use.
A <xref:System.Uri> with the multicast address.
The default UDP multicast address for IPv4.
To be added.
The default UDP multicast address for IPv6.
To be added.
Gets or sets the multicast address.
The default value is <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint.DefaultIPv4MulticastAddress>.
A <xref:System.Uri> instance that contains the multicast address.
Gets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpTransportSettings"></xref> instance associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpTransportSettings"> </xref> serverinstans kopplad till den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpTransportSettings> to change UDP transport settings for the UDP endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Använd den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpTransportSettings>att ändra inställningarna för UDP-transport för UDP-slutpunkten.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpTransportSettings>

trans-unit.source: The UDP transport settings for the endpoint.
